keyword: how many calories in a tablespoon of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in a Tablespoon of Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a tablespoon of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tablespoon of Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter with no added sugar or salt; 1 tbsp â‰ˆ16 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, ingredients (e.g., added sugar/oil), and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of peanut butter provides about 94 kcal and 4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tablespoon of natural peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 94 kcal for 1 tbsp of natural, unsalted peanut butter.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
Does peanut butter have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 8 g total fat per tbsp, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Added sugars, oils, or salts can increase calories by 10-20 kcal per tbsp.

faqs.q: Is there fiber in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1.3 g dietary fiber per tablespoon.
